question: 保守的
sourceMnemonic: Who are all <kanji>like</kanji> "I want to <kanji>preserve</kanji> and <kanji>protect</kanji> what I have, get out of my business, government!"? <vocabulary>Conservative</vocabulary> people, of course.
sourceReadingMnemonic: The reading doesn't match up for this word's <ja>守</ja>. The reading is <ja>しゅ</ja>, but you can remember that because the conservatives want to protect and preserve their <reading>hoe</reading>s (<ja>ほ</ja>) and their <reading>chute</reading>s (<ja>しゅ</ja>) from the government. For some reason those get taxed a lot.
